sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { handleSuccess } from '../utils' import CalendarView from './CalendarView' import './Home.css' const Home = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const [loggedInUser, setLoggedInUser] = useState('') const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ professor: '', department: '', school: '', room: '', day: '', startTime: '', endTime: '' }) const [bookings, setBookings] = useState([]) const [selectedBooking, setSelectedBooking] = useState(null) /* ======================= LOAD USER ======================= */ useEffect(() => { setLoggedInUser(localStorage.getItem('handleLogout')) }, []) /* ======================= LOGOUT ======================= */ const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem('token') localStorage.removeItem('handleLogout') handleSuccess('User Logged Out') setTimeout(() => navigate('/login'), 1000) } /* ======================= FORM HANDLING ======================= */ const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } /* ======================= DOUBLE BOOKING CHECK ======================= */ const isOverlapping = (newBooking) => { return bookings.some(b => b.day === newBooking.day && newBooking.startTime < b.endTime && newBooking.endTime > b.startTime ) } /* ======================= SUBMIT BOOKING ======================= */ const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() if (isOverlapping(formData)) { alert('This time slot is already booked!') return } setBookings([...bookings, formData]) setFormData({ professor: '', department: '', school: '', room: '', day: '', startTime: '', endTime: '' }) } return ( <> {/* ======================= NAVBAR ======================= */}
Conference Room Booking System
DEPARTMENT OF COMPUTER APPLICATION
Welcome {loggedInUser}
{/* ======================= PAGE CONTENT ======================= */}
{/* LEFT: BOOKING FORM */}

Book a Conference Room

{/* RIGHT: CALENDAR */}

Weekly Schedule

{/* ======================= POPUP MODAL ======================= */} {selectedBooking && (

Meeting Details

Professor: {selectedBooking.professor}

Department: {selectedBooking.department}

School: {selectedBooking.school}

Room No: {selectedBooking.room}

Day: {selectedBooking.day}

Time: {selectedBooking.startTime} – {selectedBooking.endTime}

)} ) } export default Home
